body: Okay, so I've been temporarily banned for excessive infractions - I don't understand why because I should have been banned earlier for 6 infractions  in a week, 3 weeks ago. Just because I said that I was banned 6 times in a week in the staff applications post! Obviously a mod has seen this and temp-banned me, so screw you. Lol. Nevermind, see you back online on the 11th when my ban runs out. If a mod sees this, if possible, can you un-ban me? Because I love Avicus and don't mean to do bad things. Thanks.

title: That's Not Good...

replies.body: Don't appeal on the forums. Send an E-mail to support@avicus.net.
replies.body_tagged: Don't appeal on the forums. Send an E-mail to support@avicus.net.

replies.body:
Send a ban appeal, and the players mentioned above.
However, it is only 4 days. I am sure you can wait it out.
